title: Capacity derating for operating temperature
fullText:
The available capacity of a battery is affected by the electrolyte temperature, generally decreasing with decreasing temperature. Temperature variations within cells vary more slowly than the ambient air temperature because of their large thermal mass. Therefore the battery capacity should be derated, based on the monthly minimum daily average air temperature.
